sourcesContent:
import "./Task.css"; function Task({ task }) { const { description, date, process } = task; console.log(process) console.log(date) console.log(description) return (

Title: {description.title}

Description: {description.content}

Completed
Due:

{date.hour}:{date.minute} {" "} - {date.day}/{date.month}/{date.year}

Thời gian đã thực hiện: {process.actual_duration}h

); } export default Task;
